name: Big Top Striker
description:
Big Top Striker - Two teams in the ultimate showdown, go head to head / toe to toe with three of your buddies, by the end, you will probably leave with one.



Jump around, get all the power ups, tilt the muscle Twin to your favor and ring the bell with his massive weight.

The gameplay is a four party experience. Each team has two players, with an equal chance to skew the game in their direction. Each ring of the bell counts as a point, at the end of the runtime the team with most points wins the match.

Aggression is encouraged, bump against your foes with a mighty body blow knock them off screen or use them to your ends. Get into the chaotic atmosphere of our circus show. Don’t forget to look up! Lenny the Acrobat will drop you power ups from above.

The game was developed as a part of a combined course between Bezalel Academy of Art and Design and the Hebrew University in Jerusalem. It’s the exquisite brainchild of Yona, Yam, Hala, and Mayo.
